WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_1}Weaponsmithy
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_3}We supply the town with weapons, from the cheapest to the finest. Though common smithies also produce weapons, they don't match us in quality and speed.

WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_4}Armorsmithy
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_6}We provide the finest protection. Everything from a draftee's paddings to a lord's lamellar. No other smithies can beat us in speed and quality.

WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_7}Bardingsmithy
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_9}We make saddles and bardings. Nobles demand protection for their expensive war horses, protection that takes a lot of material and skill to make - that's what we do.

WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_10}Fletcher Workshop
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_12}We make the deadliest arrows, bolts, and the most accurate bows and crossbows. Other woodworkers may fancy themselves fletchers, but none make bows better or faster than us.

WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_13}Bakery
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_15}We grind grains into flour, enrich and bake it into bread. Folks all over the continent value bread as part of their diet. We also make pies of all kinds, for all tastes.

WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_16}Butcher's Workshop
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_18}We butcher all sorts of animals, for their meat and hides. Unlike unskilled folks, we make the most of the animal, while giving it a clean death.

WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_19}Mining Enterprise
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_21}We mine local minerals. Iron, limestone, silver or gold, whatever they are.

WorkshopType.name: {=BK_Reiko_shop_22}Meadery
WorkshopType.description: {=BK_Reiko_shop_24}We dillute and ferment honey in water, making it into a sweet drink. Some folks prefer it over normal beer.
